description: Damage the Chimera while it is under a [Fear] or [True Fear] debuff. Only counts damage from skills.
Damage the Chimera on all 5 of its turns in this Form using skills that scale based on enemy MAX HP, as well as [Poison], [HP Burn], and [Smite] debuffs.
Deplete the Chimera’s Duel Bar within 5 turns.
Place 2/3/4/5/6/7 unique debuffs on the Chimera within 5 of its turns while your Champions are under [Increase ACC] buffs.
Damage the Chimera while it is under a [Weaken] debuff and your Champions are under [Increase C.RATE] or [Increase C.DMG] buffs. Only counts damage from skills.
Damage the Chimera with a single skill while it is under [Weaken] and [Decrease DEF] debuffs. Will not count damage from counterattacks and skills that scale based on enemy MAX HP.
Damage the Chimera within 3 of its turns while it is under a [Decrease DEF] debuff and your Champions are under [Perfect Veil] buffs.
Place 2/3/4/5/6 unique debuffs on the Chimera and 2/3/4/5/6 unique buffs on your Champions within 3/2 of the Chimera’s turns.
Block 3/4/5/6/7/8 [Stun] debuffs using [Block Debuffs], [Intercept] or [Stone Skin] buffs within 5 of the Chimera’s turns.
Damage the Chimera while it is under 1/2/3/4/5/6 or more debuffs and your Champions are under [Increase DEF] buffs. Will not count damage from counterattacks.
Absorb damage using [Shield] buffs. Will not count surplus damage.
Block damage using [Block Damage] or [Unkillable] buffs.
Damage the Chimera within 3 of its turns while your Champions are under 5 unique buffs. Will not count damage from skills that scale based on enemy MAX HP.
Damage the Chimera while it is under a [Decrease SPD] and [Decrease DEF] debuffs. Only counts damage from skills.
Damage the Chimera with counterattacks and Ally Attack skills.
Damage the Chimera while it is under a [Leech] debuff.
Place 6/8/10 debuffs on the Chimera within 5/4/3/2 of its turns. One of the debuffs must be a [Decrease RES] debuff.
Damage the Chimera using [Reflect Damage] buffs, [Pain Link] debuffs, or passive Reflect Damage effects.
Damage the Chimera while it is under a [Block Active Skills] debuff. Only counts damage from skills.
Damage the Chimera within 2 of its turns while it is under [Block Buffs] and [HP Burn] debuffs and has no active buffs.
Damage the Chimera while it is under 5/6/7/8/9/10 or more debuffs. It must not be under a [Block Active Skills] debuff.
Damage the Chimera with [Poison] debuffs while it is also under a [Poison Sensitivity] debuff.
Keep all of your Champions alive for 3 Chimera turns.
Successfully revive 1 ally, or all allies when reviving multiple Champions.
Damage the Chimera within 3 of its turns while it is under a [Decrease ATK] debuff, and your Champions are under [Increase SPD] buffs.
Damage the Chimera with a single skill while your Champions are under [Increase ATK] and [Block Debuffs] buffs. Will not count damage from counterattacks.
Resist 10/12/14/16/18/20 debuffs while the Chimera is under a [Decrease ACC] debuff and your Champions are under [Increase RES] buffs.
